name: STARCADE - Beta
description:
Beta for STARCADE!

Spend your time (and coins) at STARCADE. After moving to a new city, you're looking for ways pass the hours and think about anything other than... Anyway, you find an arcade and decide it's a good place to start.

Play games like Match-3 Slots, Cyclone, Boulder Dash, Robot Punch, and Dice Battle (with more on the way). Win coins to earn tickets to spend on decor for your room!



This game is in the early stages of development - Some game loops haven't been implemented and alternatively some features are unused. Assets are heavily borrowed and there's no sound yet, so stay tuned for what's to come.

Controls:

arrows = control pad

z = A

x = B

enter = start
